globalConfig.hostNameHelp: Host name for SSH access. If this is omitted, the host name of the base URL configured in global configuration will be used.
globalConfig.hostNameInvalid: Please specify a valid host name
globalConfig.portHelp: TCP listener port for SSH access
globalConfig.portInvalid: The port must be between 1 and 49151

ssh.description: May modify the ssh server configuration

*.displayName: Read ssh keys of all users
*.description: May read ssh public keys for all users

*.displayName: Read and set ssh keys of all users
*.description: May read and set ssh public keys for all users

3fRby4izZ1.description: The key could not be imported. The format is invalid or not supported.
